content: Software engineer with a design background and enterprise software experience

• Proficient with rapid prototyping and multiple programming languages
  • Perform diverse job functions across multiple skill sets and communicate effectively with developers and designers

bullets: Internal technical lead on project to create package of development tools to support corporate design language, including customized Twitter Bootstrap and Appcelerator themes

Managed implementation of development tools by product teams by providing technical support, demos, and code walkthroughs, resulting in 4 product teams adopting development tools package since February
Refactored and maintained extensive documentation for internal Bootstrap theme, resulting in faster development time and reduced need for design resources when adopted by product teams
Added 6 new components to internal Bootstrap theme over 3 months, including range slider, file upload, sortable table columns, and editable table cells
With Central UX team, implemented Appcelerator prototype for new mobile version of CA Cloud Service Delivery Platform which was demoed to customers at CA World, the annual customer conference
Built new user interface for CA Normalized Infrastructure Management using Bootstrap theme and successfully handed code off to product team
Created Axure library to support both mobile and desktop corporate design language, resulting in faster and easier prototyping when adopted by 2 product teams since February
Created design patterns, interaction patterns, specs, and documentation for iOS version of corporate design language
Subject matter expert for technical questions surrounding corporate design language
Created SASS theme and library of functions for CA’s SaaS Platform, including an automatic spriting system and live ‘theme-roller’
Implemented components for CA’s SaaS Platform with ExtJS and SASS, including cross-browser testing back to IE8 and writing unit tests and API docs
Provided visual and interaction design for components for corporate design language in form of specs and documentation
Refactored internal browser-based library of clickable examples of components available on CA's SaaS Platform, resulting in increased uptime, improved error handling, and easier maintenance
Subject matter expert for SASS and CSS questions
Created interactive digital publications using iBooks Author and packaged them for download
Created training documents to enable future interns to continue creating digital publications
Wrote blog posts centered around featured artists to promote exhibits
Designed variety of seasonal mailer templates
Worked with Customer Service Representatives and clients to design postcards, letters, and other print media
Prepared projects for print on litho and laser printers
Updated and revised magazine style guide
Mentored younger students in design
Created illustrations and layouts for several recurring features
Lead illustrator for portraits
Created banner ads for local artists and art organizations
Compiled relevant resources and information and made them available on organization website
Maintained website using CMS

content: Sam Fox School of Design & Visual Arts
Margaret Blanke and Hamblett C. Grigg Memorial Scholarship Scholar 2010 - 2012
